characterDescription.skinTone: fair skin with neutral undertones, slight rosiness on the cheeks and around the nose, slightly darker around the eyes
characterDescription.eyeColor: bright sky blue eyes with a subtle darker blue limbal ring
characterDescription.eyeShape: almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned at the outer corners, large irises relative to sclera size
characterDescription.hairColor: medium chestnut brown with subtle lighter brown highlights, particularly around the face and ends
characterDescription.hairTexture: fine hair with a natural wave, slightly frizzy texture, medium density
characterDescription.hairStyle: two high pigtails or buns on either side of the head, secured with pink hair clips and white pom-poms, loose strands framing the face
characterDescription.faceShape: round face with full cheeks, slightly rounded chin, soft jawline
characterDescription.nose: small, slightly upturned nose with a rounded tip and barely visible nostrils when viewed from the front
characterDescription.lips: medium-sized lips, slightly fuller bottom lip, natural rose pink color, subtle Cupid's bow
characterDescription.smile: slight neutral expression, top teeth not visible, even lip line
characterDescription.eyebrows: medium-thick eyebrows, slightly arched, slightly darker than hair color
characterDescription.ears: medium-sized ears, close to the head, detailed earlobes with a small, defined tragus
characterDescription.cheeks: full, rounded cheeks with subtle rosy hue
characterDescription.facialProportions: balanced facial proportions, large eyes relative to face size, nose taking up approximately 1/5 of face length, mouth proportionally sized
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: subtle dark circles under eyes, very faint freckles possibly present across nose bridge, slightly uneven hairline along forehead
characterDescription.overallImpression: sweet and innocent appearance, slightly serious expression, delicate facial features
characterDescription.fullDescription: This child is a 5-6 year old girl with fair skin, featuring a soft rosy blush on her cheeks. Her bright sky blue eyes, framed by medium-thick slightly arched eyebrows, are almond-shaped and are set in a round face, contributing to her sweet appearance. Her hair is a medium chestnut brown with lighter highlights, styled in two high pigtails or buns secured with pink clips and white pom-poms with fine, wavy texture falling loosely around her face. She has a small, slightly upturned nose with rounded tip and medium rose pink lips adding to her delicate features. Distinctive dark circles are visible under her eyes adding to her slightly solemn appearance.
